Safe Score.desc: Safe Score helps people understand the severity of the current COVID situation and helps them make an informed decision to benefit themselves and everyone around them. This will contribute to flattening the curve. People simply click a button to get their current location and will receive stats for their area, along with a final “Safe Score” (0 to 100) which summarizes the extent to which people should stay home.

Coronaban.desc: Corona Ban Visualizes the different travel bans due to the corona virus to help people understand the depth of the situation and gain knowledge about nations' efforts

NRG Scouting App.desc: I created this application for my FIRST Robotics Team in the 2019 Season to help collect and analyze robot data. This application also worked in a fully offline environment and kept my team organized as we advanced to international competitions.

NRG Scouting Server.desc: This API supplements the NRG Scouting App and returns packaged data for teams to implement in their own scouting apps. This API was the backbone for our 2020 Data Collection App.
